meanings.definition: A medical procedure in which a thin, flexible tube with a camera is used to examine the inside of the stomach.
meanings.sent1: During the gastroscopy, the doctor looked inside my stomach with a tiny camera.
meanings.sent2: The gastroscopy revealed the cause of the stomach pain.
meanings.sent3: The gastroscopy was like a tiny movie being filmed inside my tummy!
meanings.sent4: The gastroscopy was a peek into the mysterious world of my stomach.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the gastroscopy; it felt like a secret exploration mission in my belly.

meanings.definition: The act of performing a gastroscopy.
meanings.sent1: Her expertise in gastroscopy made the procedure smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The gastroscopy required precision and care to be successful.
meanings.sent3: The team joked that the gastroscopy was like a stomach adventure for the doctor.
meanings.sent4: The gastroscopy was a dance of skill and technology in the operating room.
meanings.sent5: The importance of gastroscopy in diagnosing stomach issues cannot be overstated.
